thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 27 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Supernus Reports Q4 Earnings Per Share ‍$0.26​

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Supernus Reports Q4 Earnings Per Share ‍$0.26​
text:
Feb 27 (Reuters) - Supernus Pharmaceuticals Inc:
* SUPERNUS ANNOUNCES RECORD FULL YEAR 2017 FINANCIAL RESULTS, EXCEEDING OPERATING EARNINGS GUIDANCE
* Q4 REVENUE ROSE 42 PERCENT TO $88.4 MILLION * SEES ‍FULL YEAR 2018 NET PRODUCT SALES IN RANGE OF $375 MILLION TO $400 MILLION​
* SEES ‍FULL YEAR 2018 OPERATING EARNINGS IN RANGE OF $125 MILLION TO $135 MILLION​
* QTRLY EARNINGS PER SHARE ‍$0.26​ * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.27, REVENUE VIEW $87.1 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
